category.name: Product Structure.Appearance Configuration Background
category.category_description: No description available for this category.

preference.name: APPR_background_updater_interval
preference.preference_description: Deprecated. How often (in minutes) to expect a background appearance updater to be run (for example in a cron job or equivalent). When a new package is placed on the update queue, then if background updaters are expected to be running (as specified by the supervisor preference being 0) and such an updater has not recently enough, then an email is sent to the recipient specified by the Site Preference "APPR_background_updater_admin_email_address".
